arts.ttl: Amorim's 'NONSENSE' Man Utd decision blasted ahead of Man City derby
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim has come under fire for his 'nonsense' decision to stick with Altay Bayindir over new signing Senne Lammens for their clash against Manchester City . Amorim's decision to protect Lammens from the heightened pressure of a Manchester derby has been met with bewilderment by ex-Netherlands international Johan Boskamp.

arts.ttl: Analysis: Where Man City v Man Utd will be won and lost
arts.sum: Although you would expect Guardiola to name Donnarumma in his derby XI, Amorim confirmed on Friday that Altay Bayindir, who has started all three of Man Utd's Premier League matches this season, will get the nod ahead of new signing Lammens. Pep Guardiola and Ruben Amorim both invested in new goalkeepers before the transfer window closed, and even though Man Utd's recent recruit, Senne Lammens, must wait for his first start, we will still see derby debutants in goal at both ends of the pitch.

arts.ttl: Man City predicted line-up vs Man United as Gianluigi Donnarumma call made and Gvardiol starts
arts.sum: Manchester City team news ahead of the derby with Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Derby of keeper dilemmas: Man United, Man City both searching for answers in goal
arts.sum: Manchester City and Manchester United share more than just a city this season. Will Sunday's derby offer clarity for either club at goalkeeper?

arts.ttl: Alan Shearer and Paul Merson disagree as pundits make Man City vs Manchester United predictions
arts.sum: The latest Man United and Manchester City news as several pundits have given their thoughts on the Manchester derby this weekend.

arts.ttl: A vital player for Manchester City may return against Manchester United.
arts.sum: But as tomorrow’s clash with Manchester United draws closer, it seems that Gvardiol could return for Pep Guardiola’s side tomorrow. Manchester City has missed the presence of Josko Gvardiol on the pitch to start the 25/26 season.

arts.ttl: The Manchester derby intrigue playing out 2,000 miles away after Man United and Man City transfer calls
arts.sum: Manchester City host Manchester United in the Premier League this weekend. Two starters from the previous derby will instead be facing off against each other in Turkey.

arts.ttl: The Man City deal that sparked outrage at Manchester United - 'What is he doing?'
arts.sum: Carlos Tevez shocked Sir Alex Ferguson when swapping Man United for 'small club' Manchester City in the summer of 2009.
